comment.author: 58241007@N06
comment._content: Walking up Akersgata in Oslo, Oslo Samvirkelag was located in todays Akersgata 65. The tall building in the background used to be our old Goverment building, now the Ministry of Finance. The low building in front is demolished. There are no long a tram running down Akersgata. Both buildings on the right are still there.
comment.authorname: Aslak - Too little time to shot

comment.author: 78993495@N00
comment._content: When I was a boy, I often went in to eat a cake inside "Samson" on the corner of the second building to the right. Not much changes from the 1940s until today there.
